The initial color for the editor to pre-select.
Docs.summary: Starts a to build a color property.
Docs.returns: The color that was selected. This value will be a named color, or an RGB color expressed in HTML color format (#RRGGBB).

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `initialColor` parameter should be a named color, or an RGB color expressed in HTML color format (#RRGGBB).
